summary:
Vishal Mega Mart IPO Allotment Finalised Today: Know Latest GMP, How To Check Allotment Status Online

Last Updated: December 16, 2024, 17:20 IST

The Vishal Mega Mart IPO allotment has been finalised, and investors can expect confirmation via bank debit messages. The IPO has garnered significant interest, with a high subscription rate across categories.

  • The IPO was open for subscription from December 11 to 13 and was oversubscribed 28.75 times.
  • Latest grey market premium (GMP) stands at 24.36%, trading at Rs 97.
  • The allotment notification will be sent out by December 16 evening.
  • Shares will be listed on BSE and NSE on December 18.
“The IPO price band was set at Rs 74 to Rs 78 per share, with considerable interest across all categories.”

The Vishal Mega Mart IPO reflects strong investor confidence, making it a significant event in India's retail market.
newTitle: Vishal Mega Mart IPO Allotment Finalised Today: Latest Updates and How to Check

Supreme Court moots transfer of Amazon, Flipkart cases to Karnataka High Court on CCI's plea - Bar & Bench - Indian Legal News
summary:
Supreme Court moots transfer of Amazon, Flipkart cases to Karnataka High Court on CCI's plea

Published on: 16 Dec 2024, 9:51 am

The Supreme Court has expressed its preliminary view that all ongoing cases against Amazon and Flipkart for anti-competitive practices should be consolidated and transferred to the Karnataka High Court.

  • The Supreme Court observed that all related cases currently pending in various High Courts should ideally be transferred to Karnataka.
  • A hearing for the case in Karnataka High Court is scheduled for December 17.
  • The court has ordered that no further proceedings should occur in the Karnataka High Court until a decision is made on January 6.
  • The Competition Commission of India filed a transfer plea urging consolidation of 24 pending writ petitions against the e-commerce giants.
  • These cases were originally filed by the Delhi Vyapar Sangh, highlighting alleged violations of the Competition Act, 2002.
  • Concerns were raised regarding the absence of some parties in the proceedings, and there are now 26 petitions related to the issue.
“Parties which are represented today take notice. We permit petitioner to add parties. Amended cause title shall be filed in two days.”

The case has significant implications for competition law enforcement in India and may streamline adjudications concerning e-commerce operations.
newTitle: Supreme Court Considers Transferring Amazon and Flipkart Cases to Karnataka High Court

Mobikwik IPO Allotment Today: Check GMP, Listing Status And Other Details - ABP Live
summary:
Mobikwik IPO Allotment Today: Check GMP, Listing Status And Other Details

Date: December 16, 2024 Source: ABP Live

The final allotment of the Mobikwik maiden offer will be completed today, allowing investors to find out the status of their applications. The IPO was highly subscribed and is set to debut in the stock market soon.

  • The IPO was open for subscription from December 11-13, 2024.
  • Priced between Rs 265 to Rs 279 with a minimum lot size of 53 shares.
  • Oversubscribed 119.38 times overall.
  • Retail investors subscribed 134.67 times, while QIBs subscribed 119.50 times and NIIs subscribed 108.95 times.
  • Shares are trading at a grey market premium of 59.14%, around Rs 444.
  • Mobikwik has over 161 million users and a merchant network of 4.26 million as of June 2024.
“Grey market premium represents investors' confidence regarding the upcoming listing.”

Investors can check the allotment status on the official exchanges or the issue’s registrar, Link Intime India.
newTitle: Mobikwik IPO Allotment Today: Check GMP, Listing Status And Other Details

Google names its new India chief - TechCrunch
summary:
Google Appoints Preeti Lobana as New India Chief

Publication Date: Unknown | Source: TechCrunch

Google has appointed Preeti Lobana to lead its India business, filling a key position left vacant since July.

  • Preeti Lobana previously served as VP of Advertising Technology at Google.
  • India is a crucial market for Google, which has invested billions to enhance digital access.
  • Google has faced regulatory scrutiny in India, including fines totaling $275 million in recent years.
  • Roma Datta Chobey, interim chief, will return to manage Google’s digital business unit.
  • Lobana emphasized the importance of AI in shaping future business opportunities.
“This is a once-in-a-lifetime moment to shape the future with AI, unlocking unprecedented opportunities for businesses to boost productivity.”

In conclusion, Preeti Lobana’s appointment comes at a time of great challenge and opportunity for Google in India.
newTitle: Google Appoints Preeti Lobana as New India Chief

Mobikwik IPO Allotment Live Updates: Check GMP price, Listing date, and other key details - The Financial Express
summary:
Mobikwik IPO Allotment Live Updates: Check GMP price, Listing date, and other key details

Published: December 16, 2024 14:29 IST | Source: Financial Express

The Mobikwik IPO, priced between Rs 265 and 279, is set for a final allotment today, December 16, with the listing on December 18. This IPO is part of a fresh issue valued at Rs 572 crore, consisting of 2.05 crore equity shares.

  • The IPO opened for bidding from December 11 to December 13.
  • The lead managers include SBI Capital Markets and Dam Capital Advisors.
  • Mobikwik shares are currently trading at a grey market premium of Rs 165, indicating strong investor interest.
  • The IPO was subscribed 119.38 times on the final day of bidding.
“Mobikwik’s addressable market in FY23 is approximately USD 5.3 billion, projected to grow significantly by FY28,” stated Geojit.

Overall, the Mobikwik IPO is generating significant interest, and industry observers are keenly awaiting its listing.
newTitle: Mobikwik IPO Allotment Live Updates: Details, Pricing, and Significance

title: Stock Market Live: Nifty, Sensex Decline As TCS, Infosys Share Prices Drag - NDTV Profit
summary:
Stock Market Live: Nifty, Sensex Decline As TCS, Infosys Share Prices Drag

Date: 16 Dec 2024, Source: NDTV Profit

Today, the Indian stock markets saw a decline with major IT stocks such as TCS and Infosys dragging down the Nifty and Sensex indices. Additional pressure was observed from fluctuating share prices in the banking and financial sectors.

  • Nifty and Sensex decline due to falling prices in TCS and Infosys.
  • Bajaj Finance and Power Grid Corp shares show some recovery, preventing further dips.
  • Concerns surrounding European stocks affect market sentiment.
  • India VIX increased over 11%, indicating heightened market volatility.
  • India Pesticides undergoes an IT search while cooperating fully with authorities.
“The Nifty 50 and Sensex were trading off day's low as Bajaj Finance Ltd. and Power Grid Corp of India share prices rose.”

The market context reflects a complex relationship between technology stock performance and overall market health, suggesting investors remain cautious amidst rising volatility.
newTitle: Stock Market Live: Declines in Nifty and Sensex Driven by IT Stocks

Reliance Industries shares set to close the year with negative returns for the first time in 10 years - The Financial Express
summary:
Reliance Industries shares set to close the year with negative returns for the first time in 10 years

Publication Date: December 16, 2024

Source: Financial Express

Mukesh Ambani-led Reliance Industries (RIL) is set to conclude 2024 with negative stock returns, marking the first such occurrence in ten years as its stock has faced challenges across various business verticals.

  • Reliance's stock has underperformed, tumbling 15% over the past three months.
  • The company's market cap currently stands at Rs 17.22 lakh crore.
  • Notable declines occurred post-AGM in August 2024, with investor disappointment following unclear monetisation plans.
  • The annual return is expected to be negative for the first time since 2014, with stock declines in September, October, November, and December.
  • Challenges include margin pressure in oil and gas, slower growth in telecom ARPU, and restructuring in retail.
"Despite its struggles, Reliance remains a critical player in the Indian market."

As the company grapples with these setbacks, its historical performance suggests potential for recovery, although future performance will depend on how it manages ongoing challenges.
newTitle: Reliance Industries Faces First Negative Returns in a Decade

title: Mobikwik IPO Allotment: How to check allotment status online on NSE, BSE, Link Intime - The Financial Express
summary:
Mobikwik IPO Allotment Status Check on BSE, NSE Official Website (Link Intime)

Date: December 16, 2023
Source: Financial Express

The Mobikwik IPO aims to raise Rs 572 crore and has been subscribed more than 125 times. Here's how to check your allotment status online.

Key Points

  • The IPO was open from December 11 to December 13, 2023.
  • Investors can check allotment status on Link Intime and NSE websites.
  • The IPO shares are expected to debut in secondary markets on December 18, 2023.
  • The shares were trading at a 59% premium in the grey market.
  • The price band for the IPO was Rs 265 to Rs 279 per share.

Notable Quotes

“At the upper price band of Rs 279, Mobikwik is available at market cap/sales of 2.5x, which appears to be reasonably priced.” - Geojit Financial Services

Investors who didn’t receive allotments will be refunded from December 17, 2023.
newTitle: How to Check Mobikwik IPO Allotment Status Online

title: LG eyes up to $15 billion valuation for India unit IPO: Report - The Economic Times
summary:
LG Seeks Up to $15 Billion Valuation for Indian Unit IPO

Date: Not specified
Source: Bloomberg News

LG Electronics Inc. is considering a raise in the valuation of its Indian unit to $15 billion for an IPO in Mumbai next year, based on initial feedback from analysts and investors.

  • LG is targeting a listing within the first half of 2025.
  • The company previously estimated a valuation of around $13 billion.
  • The roadshow for the IPO is set to begin in the next two months.
  • LG may aim to raise between $1 billion to $1.5 billion through the IPO.
  • Key financial institutions involved include Morgan Stanley and JPMorgan Chase.
  • LG shares have fallen about 13% this year, leading to a market value of $10 billion.
  • India's IPO market has seen significant activity this year, raising nearly $18 billion.
“Deliberations are ongoing and details could change.”

The ongoing interest in IPOs signifies a strong market performance, with multiple companies achieving substantial raises this year.
newTitle: LG Seeks Up to $15 Billion Valuation for Indian Unit IPO

title: Setback from SC may cause further delay in CCI probe into e-commerce platforms - Moneycontrol
Gold holds steady above one-week low on softer USD; upside seems limited - FXStreet
summary:
Gold Sticks to Modest Intraday Gains Above $2,650 Amid Mixed Cues

Publication Date: October 2023, Source: FXStreet

The gold price recovers modestly from a recent low as geopolitical tensions and softer US Treasury yields provide some support, despite expectations of a less dovish Federal Reserve impacting prices.

  • Gold price enters a bearish consolidation phase near a one-week trough touched on Monday.
  • Geopolitical tensions, softer US bond yields, and a weaker USD offer modest support to the XAU/USD.
  • Expectation of a less dovish Fed seems to cap gains ahead of the FOMC meeting this week.
  • Israel expands presence in Golan Heights, raising regional tensions.
  • Israeli strikes in Gaza and NATO warnings about Russia amplify geopolitical risks.
  • Traders are pricing in over a 93% chance the Fed will lower rates by 25 basis points.
  • Economic indicators suggest a slowing pace in the Fed’s rate-cutting cycle.
"The focus will be on the crucial FOMC decision on Wednesday, with traders also taking cues from the accompanying policy statement and Fed Chair Jerome Powell's remarks."

In conclusion, while gold shows some resilience, market sentiment remains cautious ahead of key economic announcements.
newTitle: Gold Sticks to Modest Intraday Gains Above $2,650 Amid Mixed Cues
